description.last_approved_text: Armies and settlements consume [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]food each turn. It can also be used to occupy settlements at higher levels and purchase uses of the Menace Below army ability. [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]Food is gained from fighting battles and can be grown by special buildings in settlements with the [[img:icon_resource_pastures]][[/img]]Pastures resource.

pooled_resources.description: Armies and settlements consume [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]food each turn. It can also be used to occupy settlements at higher levels and purchase uses of the Menace Below army ability. [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]Food is gained from fighting battles and can be grown by special buildings in settlements with the [[img:icon_resource_pastures]][[/img]]Pastures resource.

description.last_approved_text: Crafting items, awakening Legions of Legend through the Mortuary Cult, and unlocking dynasties all consume [[img:icon_jars]][[/img]]Canopic Jars. [[img:icon_jars]][[/img]]Canopic Jars are obtained by victory in battle, constructing certain buildings and completing missions.

[[img:icon_jars]][[/img]]Canopic Jars are obtained by victory in battle, constructing certain buildings and completing missions.

description.last_approved_text: Ritual currency is used to provide the power necessary to gain influence over the vortex
